All.Comments: Fix the incorrect texture in the starting flip map room.
Any pickups will be moved nearby.
Remove the triggers that close door 143.
Make a timed trigger for the door to open/close.
Don't activate the door by default.

Any.Comments: Convert one of the end trapdoors into a trap.
Potential lever shuffle before the scion.
Modify the shortcut slope in room 40.
Any pickups on the old slope will be moved nearby
Patch the gaps in the walls.
Move the egg so it's not embedded in the new slope.

AllWithin.Comments: Don't move clang-clang #84, but do convert the trigger into a pad so it switches off.
Make a maze before the beginning.
An extra room above the maze.
Visibility portals for the new rooms.
Pad to trigger the door at the maze exit.
Re-open the door from the other side.
Auto-generate vertex lighting in the new room.
Make a long drop before the beginning.
Visibility portals for the new rooms.
Flood the rooms after the drop.
Auto-generate vertex lighting in the new room.
Make an RX-Tech style maze at the beginning.
Visibility portals for the new rooms.
Auto-generate vertex lighting in the new room.
This door is stolen from the Adam platform.
Add a quad where the door was.

Condition.Comments: If Lara's not in the default starting position, move the flipmap trigger to her new location provided she is in the same room.
If Adam or Barney is present, we have to change the scion type as the MiscAnim that normally ends the level will have been overwritten.

OnTrue.Comments: Convert the scion type to the one from Great Pyramid, so Lara has to shoot it to end the level.

Mirrored.Comments: Moves switch 16 otherwise the door here opens against it.
Bacon Lara doesn't work when mirrored, so make an alternative scenario in this room (TombATI only).
Move the enemy off the slope otherwise it's likely to get stuck.
Remove the redundant camera triggers from the room.
Turn the trapdoor into a pickup.
Moves the switch to the other side of the room.
Add a trigger to open the door, now on a timer.
